{{wikipedia|Ashi River}}
===Etymology===
A medieval transcription of the {{etyl|juc|zh}} name meaning "[[gold|Gold]] [[river|River]]". (Elsewhere, the Jurchen word for gold is transcribed as {{ltc-l|[[按]][[春]]}}.)
